function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited space and inadequate rooms in apartments making it uncomfortable for residents","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor airborne transmission of covid-19 in crowded and poorly ventilated environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Literature search on disaster management and open government projects","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection and review process","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded urban green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conceptualizing loneliness as a singular, unidimensional construct","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of explicit design strategies and guidelines for translating biophilic design into architectural design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlapping in the identification of covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studies focusing on contagious diseases propagation and control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited coverage of historical literature may result in incomplete understanding of pandemic trends and strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of safety recommendations during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on eating out and lack of cooking skills among consumers.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Homogeneous mixing conditions g=1 leading to increased disease spreading","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor lighting","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of endogenous parameters like creatinine and urea could lead to incorrect assessments of water quality and potential health risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation for air distribution","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of promotion of green logistics and waste management regulations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Value co-creation is broadened to the service network to include other stakeholders such as their competitors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distrust towards tap water and alternative water risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to judge the magnitude of the problem","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited descriptive material based on risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of high-density districts to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in crowded occupational over-reliance on remote healthcare and delay in seeking in-person medical attention for critical conditions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collected from a specific group may not be representative of the overall population of kuwait, leading to biased conclusions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Kt platform not providing trustworthy evidence during the pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of drones, robotics, and image processing technologies for
